class lms2.base.base_units.EffortSource(*args, time, effort, kind='linear', fill_value='extrapolate', effort_name='flow', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: lms2.base.base_units.SourceUnit

Base Effort Source Unit. Generates one effort variable and fixe it using interpolation.

class lms2.base.base_units.FlowLoad(*args, time, flow, kind='linear', flow_name='flow', fill_value='extrapolate', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: lms2.base.base_units.SourceUnit

Base Flow Load Unit. Generates one flow variable and fixe it using interpolation. Convention is set to sens=’in’ (the flow is counted positive when going in the unit).

class lms2.base.base_units.FlowSource(*args, time, profile, kind='linear', fill_value='extrapolate', flow_name='flow', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: lms2.base.base_units.SourceUnit

Base Flow Source Unit. Generates one flow variable and fixe it using interpolation. Convention is set to sens=’out’ (the flow is counted positive when going out of the unit).

class lms2.base.base_units.SourceUnit(*args, time, flow, kind='linear', fill_value='extrapolate', flow_name='flow', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: lms2.core.units.DynUnit

General Source Unit. Generates One variable tha may be fixed. This is a base class for definition of Effort/Flow, Source/Load.

class lms2.base.base_units.SourceUnitParam(*args, time, flow, kind='linear', fill_value='extrapolate', flow_name='flow', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: lms2.core.units.DynUnit

General Source Unit. Generates One parameter that may be fixed. This is a base class for definition of Effort/Flow, Source/Load.

Bases: lms2.core.units.DynUnit

Base units for tests

lms2.base.base_units.set_profile(profile, kind='linear', fill_value='extrapolate')[source]¶

Generates constraint functions used to set bounds and values of the profile

Parameters:
  • Serie profile (pandas) – Series that describes the input profile
  • kind (str) – kind of interpolation see scipy.interpolate.interpolate.interp1d
  • fill_value (str) – see scipy.interpolate.interpolate.interp1d
Returns:
